item.title: The Housemaid 2 ‘Guaranteed’ By Its Star After Becoming A Box Office Smash
item.description: The Housemaid is turning into a box office hit and as such, The Housemaid 2 seems likely. Not likely, but guaranteed, according to one of its stars.

item.title: Cop Transforms Into Frog According To AI Generated Police Report
item.description: An AI police report tool turned a cop into a “frog,” exposing how generative AI in policing can warp reality.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Finale Dethroned In Netflix’s Top 10 List By A New Show
item.description: Despite just airing a blockbuster finale, there's a new show that has unseated Stranger Things on the top of Netflix's top 10 list.

item.title: Apple Won’t Release iPhone 18 In 2026, New Report Claims
item.description: If you’re looking forward to buying the iPhone 18, it seems you’re going to have a long wait.

item.title: Apple iPhone 18 May See A Sharp Price Increase, New Report Claims
item.description: The next iPhone could have a processor inside that’s a lot more expensive. Which will likely increase the price of the phone.
